verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Why should we be disturbed, and why should we fear.
Why should we feel cast down, for the Lord, He is near.
In His word, He has promised us, He won't leave us alone.
And He wants us to be secure, in the love of a father for his son.
Chorus:
Underneath are the everlasting arms.
Around our city are encamped the hosts of God.
Our Shepherd watches over all his flock by night.
And we can rest in His love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the things I don't understand seem to cause me to doubt.
And I find deep inside of me, many voices cry out.
And I feel tired and weary, and my strength, it is gone.
Then God's truth comes to set me free, and to fill me
with courage to go on.
